website_summaries.verdict: Considering the reasonable price, you’ll appreciate receiving a full HD resolution display screen measuring 14.1 inches.
pros: Provides a good battery life of up to 8 hours
Extremely thin and lightweight design, so it’s a perfect on-the-go laptop
cons: Only has 8 GB of RAM, so it cannot handle heavy-duty software

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the laptop for about a week now and I am extremely impressed with the build quality and what you get for your money. The screen feels like glass, keyboard has a really nice feeling, very sturdy and high quality built. It comes with Win 10, once you turn it on it will prompt you to activate or setup your Win 10 account, (language, location etc). Camera quality is not that great but still usable. Speakers quality is between medium and high quality. I highly recommend it, good for teleworking, working on projects, watch movies. Communication with seller (Chuwi representative) was great!
customer_reviews.author: JACOBO

customer_reviews.title: Tons of Value!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my lap lapbook pro. Let me be clear--this is not a powerhouse pc. This is more of a very premium low powered ultrabook. It's great to use for school which was my primary use. With 8 GB ram and 256 gb it has plenty of space/speed for word, YouTube (will play 4k with no stuttering), and web browsing. The only problem I have with the .machine is that you cannot use any USBC to charge the device. Only the provided usbc will charge it. Bummer. Otherwise its great. If you're on the fence just do it. I'm happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Defective item
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is nice and well built. It looks and feels high quality, however these lines appeared on the screen after lightly using for just one day. Strangely enough, the lines are covering half the screen now and are continuing to travel up.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For 300 bucks (after coupon and using points I had) it is worth every penny. Surprisingly well built and a bright better than average display. I never tried it while running Windows so I can’t comment on how it performed on windows but on Ubuntu it’s snappy and responsive. I wouldn’t recommend it for intense applications. I use it mostly for day to day use: excel (libreoffice), web browsing, movies and some python scripting. Super slim and sleek. Cons: a little awkward to open, the power supply is super cheap feeling, only 1 usb3 port & 1 usb c port. The power button is a key.
customer_reviews.author: George T

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Build quality - very good: rigid aluminum. The screen is amazing - IPS, bright, no PWM in backlight (that's a big plus for people who don't want excess eyestrain). Battery holds 8-9 hours of office use. Processor and RAM is sufficient to run two IDEs, three docker services and 30 chrome tabs without lagging or reloading pages if you are on Linux. Perfect keyboard layout. Downsides: lid magnet is too strong and camera not the best quality, but both aren't big deal. At first i wanted to put a sticker on a Chuwi brand, but now I am actually proud of it. Great job. Great deal for frontenders, pythonistas and so on who cares about their eyes.
customer_reviews.author: aleksandrs dembo

customer_reviews.title: Best Budget Laptop Money Can Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of if not the best budget laptops that I have ever seen. The screen is AMAZING for a sub $400 laptop. Viewing angles are great and the brightness is up to par with the $1000 laptops. Performance is also great everything runs very smooth and not lag. The build is also Amazing, the metal body makes it feel way more expensive than it actually is. The only things that I can find wrong with it is that it’s kinda hard to open when it’s closed and it gets a bit warm. Other than that I completely recommend this laptop to anyone who is looking for an absolute deal.
customer_reviews.author: John Hatts

customer_reviews.title: Lapbook Pro Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I am impressed with quality of product. Uninstall some bloatware, update and make adjustments and it's a bad little machine. I had BT on and screen brightness high and you can see battery being drained but not how I thought. After I fixed all that battery holds up. My only con the keys could be a little more firm maybe another port but I have a hub so that's nothing. It's a Homeruns for me and a big thanks to all of you at Chuwi
customer_reviews.author: Steve Castle

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and quick setup and startup.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little work laptop. Needed something smaller and faster than my huge Dell laptop. This was the right price and size for my needs. It set up in a flash-and I am not tech at all-so I was able to work right away. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lee

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed with this purchase. I brother has this computer and it works great for him so even though it’s inexpensive I thought I’d give it a try. After attempting to boot up for two days and not being able to get past the first screen I broke down and tried to get in touch with support to help. Amazon was not able to help and referred me to the manufacturer, Chuwi. They took 2 days to respond and were of little to no help. I have returned this and will spend the extra money to buy a brand from an actual store that I know I can rely on!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Good on paper. Sub par in reality.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this thing so bad... It has everything going for it on paper, but the finished product is so meh. It feels good in the hand but once you start to look a little closer you notice the flaws... The screws are all loose. One screw just turned endlessly. The metal bottom didn't fit right and there was a gap where you could see inside.
customer_reviews.author: HhTt Studio

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Overall it looks to be good but it is a bit slow with windows 10 running on it So I installed linux and belive me, none of the laptops I had(I had ibm, toshiba, hp, lenovo) comes close to how good this laptop is. Display is very pleasant and clean Power seem to last forever, like easy goes for 10 hrs with normal work and over 5 hrs if I watching movies etc Light weight and very elegantly designed, no cheap stuff All in all, I do’nt care to have an expensive mac book now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my wife.
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my wife. She loves here new laptop. The screen is perfect. Its top quality the materials.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel_Alarc

customer_reviews.title: Short life span
customer_reviews.text: I've had this laptop for almost 5 months. It died and wouldn't power on again. It has a blinking blue light. It was the strangest thing. When it was working, it was a great laptop. It is lightweight, the keys feel nice, and overall works pretty fast for general use. I have tried to get a hold of Chuwi and no luck. Their website is terrible. Their support chat is via Facebook messenger which to no one responds. You get what you pay for, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Urdnot Wrex

customer_reviews.title: Poor product--Stay AWAY!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 10/06/2020 Let me get this out of the way. The laptop gets very hot easily and is very slow at times. Keyboard backlight keeps going off. Terrible processor. Screen is a little glaring in sun. Right shift button is very small. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!I WANT A REFUND! UNFORTUNATELY, I HAVE TO KEEP IT FOR SCHOOL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: geo

customer_reviews.title: Came broken but an easy fix.
customer_reviews.text: ****Update**** I took the cover off and found it to be a loose wire to the speaker. Works fine now. Great laptop... if only it had two working speakers. I thought that somehow this computer only had 1 speaker until I ran an audio test. There are in fact two. One of the speakers was just broken and very static sounding and about 75% lower than the other one. I have started the return process...
customer_reviews.author: Honest opinion

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value but broken quickly
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in September 2019, and I was initially very impressed. Pros: Excellent value for the money, beautiful screen, and lightweight. Cons: Difficult to open with one hand and heats up quickly due to the fanless design. But three months later a rear hinge has broken and the screen no longer works. I'm hoping this will be covered under a warranty but it's hard to tell from the Chuwi documentation.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Better than Asus or overly expensive Apple products
customer_reviews.text: Got the laptop yesterday and they are two things that stuck out to me immediately the lightweight thing frame & the glossy screen. Even though I used a new Asus Vivobook 15 for over a week and the resolutions are the same, the Chuwi screen looks like it has nearly twice the pixel density, colors and video look FAR more vivid & clear, also the price I got it for is an absolute steal. Only complaint I'd give is that it's slightly a struggle to open the laptop, but I have had it for less than 48 hours when writing this review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: too slow
customer_reviews.text: Too slow, I stoped every other activity on this laptop and still too slow, typing this review took a while, I had to wait between typing each letter and I had to type very slowly for the letters to register.
customer_reviews.author: AMAXAMA

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay not long term
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is okay. For short term and I mean short term. I got the laptop in April and it’s already coming apart. The laptop has screws and the screws are coming out on it own. The charger isn’t good and mine just broke and i can’t find a replacement. I needed a laptop badly. If you buy this one be very careful using it
customer_reviews.author: Safiayya K.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Charger (broken and cannot replace) and Cheap Hinges
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased two of these. Very quickly we had two major issues: 1. The hinge broke on her laptop after a couple months of light use and the whole bottom plate came apart as a result. We were able to get it fixed by at a repair shop and are very careful opening and closing the laptop. 2. The charger snapped apart after less than a week of use. This wouldn't be a big issue except that no other USB-C laptop charger or USB-C cable has worked to charge it. (We now share a charger and hope that it does not break.) We have contacted CHUWI (and their after-sale contact) to purchase another charger with no response.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Finney

customer_reviews.title: Totally Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It looked perfect coming out of the box. But, it did no come with a charging box or cable. Looking for the kind it required, I found one for $54.00 dollars in town. However it didnt' work with this unit. sent it back within 48 hours. Until Chuwi starts supplying the necessary charging device and cord, I would not wast your time dealing with their problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dwstreak

customer_reviews.title: beautiful but Wi-Fi problems
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully designed computer and it looks so fabulous. However, I had to return it for a refund, because the Wi-Fi connection just would not recognize strong connections that my other computer and phone would easily pick up. what a pity, because on paper it seemed like it was the perfect computer for me.
customer_reviews.author: kmrotterdam

customer_reviews.title: Used Computer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this computer thinking it was new. I wasn't. When I turned it on, it obviously was a used computer as it required a password to access it. I'm stuck and cannot use this computer. Obviously someone else set it up and password protected it, then returned it. CHUWI did not take the time to look at the computer, just put it back on the shelf and shipped it out. I've been trying to get hold of CHUWI, but there are no phone numbers available. Only email (response in 48 hours) or chat (response in 24 hours). Seriously??? Not a happy camper at this point. I'm waiting for a response.
customer_reviews.author: darrell brooks

customer_reviews.title: Not a durable laptop
customer_reviews.text: The computer is fine from a software perspective, but the hardware is terrible. The screen is difficult to open and the lower part of the computer is now starting to fall off. Although it seems like good value for your money, the quality of the PC's construction is so poor that it won't last you very long.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty design
customer_reviews.text: The weight of the laptop is perfect, the design too, very good performance for office work and youtube videos, but the problem is that it overheats a lot, I recommend Chuwi to solve that problem because they are doing a good job so far , hopefully in 2020 they will improve even more the quality of this laptop that I think is excellent, but for that problem I assign a 4 in qualification
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Mendieta

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, super fast and most importantly it is not full of "Bulk Ware". Thank you, Thank You, Thank You! I would only suggest one improvement. When the track pad is tilted higher than the keys they let out to much light. Five Stars definitely and 9 out of 10 Rating.
customer_reviews.author: David Dodge

customer_reviews.title: laptop stopped holding charge after 3 months of usage and product support is not responding
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of usage battery stopped holding charge, so it doesn't work without power supply anymore. I tried to reach out for the product support, but initially they sent some program that does not work on my OS (I use ubuntu) and then just stopped answering regarding my further actions. I heard a lot about attention Chuwi pays to its customer, but for now I'm not satisfied, to put it mildly.
customer_reviews.author: Stas

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny and More
customer_reviews.text: I love this lightweight laptop. It does everything I need and at a great price. It also can hold a charge for a fairly long time as well as has a lot of disk space. I would buy this computer again and probably will when necessary. The only negative is the power cord is short.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive laptop that looks like a MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: This is actually not a bad product. works really well. it’s actually pretty snappy and it downloaded all the updates fairly quickly. compared to my HP computer. I do recommend this if you’re in need for inexpensive PC... The only problem I have with this is the screen has more of a Black edge then what they showed on the ad. I don’t know if they sent me the wrong one or if the screen is supposed to be like this all in all it’s a great computer I do recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Chaidez

customer_reviews.title: Great value for specs of the machine!
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Fast, great quality materials have been used on the build of this machine. I was skeptical at first as I was not familiar with the brand. But the specs and price made me give it a try. Thoroughly impressed with this machine overall.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Screws are falling out on week 1
customer_reviews.text: This laptop does the bare minimum, but not very well, the wireless connection of any kind (ie Bluetooth or wifi) is spotty (tested with multiple devices) and after a few weeks of use the screws on the bottom started falling out. The laptop runs hot but does not overheat which is good but still it runs hot. All in all, not the best product, I would recommend something else
customer_reviews.author: Thane

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop for my daughter who's entering grad school, and she tells me it's performing excellently!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely great graphic. Only negative it gets pretty hot underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Horton

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Build quality seemed decent for the price. Screen is bright enough. Biggest issue is when I noticed that the usb drive was unusable due to the port being misaligned. Deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: B2

customer_reviews.title: good laptop. USB C port is useless
customer_reviews.text: I need to use two monitors with this laptop. The minihdmi port allows for one monitor to be hooked up. The only other outlet capable of supporting another monitor is the USB C port. I bought a USB C hub that works for power delivery just fine, although the HDMI port on the hub is useless as are the usb ports. CHUWI needs to fix this as their USB C port is only for power delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Brett S.

customer_reviews.title: if you want to throw your money away I bought this product
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality product after 3 months of use, one hinge of the screen broke soon after the other, and it only lasted a couple of months, it burned no more and no less one day it did not light more, it does not waste your money on this equipment, send emails for the guarantee months ago and I still have not received a reply I did not buy these brands they are very poor their quality
customer_reviews.author: LUIS MARTINEZ

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pretty positive experience with this computer so far. It's very lightweight, with a great display quality including the brightness and clarity. The speakers leave something to be desired so if the computer audio volume is important to you this probably isn't the choice. Overall good quality for the money though.
customer_reviews.author: James Ponder

customer_reviews.title: The bottom cover is not durable
customer_reviews.text: The bottom crews brook without the laptop falling or hitting anything
customer_reviews.author: Steve Pamo

customer_reviews.title: Type-C Charger do not work with other 12V/2A adaptor
customer_reviews.text: This laptop cannot be charged with other 12V/2A adaptors. We lost the charger and could not find alternative one for this laptop. I have sent email to customer@chuwi.com, but did not receive any response. Now my I cannot use my laptop at all.
customer_reviews.author: Arun

customer_reviews.title: Good screen resolution
customer_reviews.text: Very nice screen and build very well , you will like it, for this price, it's worth it
customer_reviews.author: abouelkaseem

customer_reviews.title: Great notebook
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this notebook: arrived quickly, setup quickly, and feel good quality and sturdy. The battery last several hours of constant use.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamad EL-Bawab

customer_reviews.title: Perfect laptop
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is well worth the money! Ignore all bad reviews! Picture quality is amazing, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for given price. Gotta love the screen though.
customer_reviews.text: There were a couple of things that bothered me; for example, it is really hard to open the laptop. The good features balance out the cons of buying this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Adialim Jiménez

customer_reviews.title: Cautious of Quality
customer_reviews.text: This laptop lasted about a month until the keyboard went out and then quit working all together. I think I just got a defective one though, because up until then it was a great computer.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Torres

customer_reviews.title: nice little laptop for the money
customer_reviews.text: super quick. no issues. i use it at the house only and dont put much wear and tear on it so i can say it works great for what i use it for. Dont know how it would hold up on the go
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Suddenly stops to power-on
customer_reviews.text: This laptop worked for a few days and suddenly it stoped to power on. Checking on the internet this is a common problem for this brand.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: gray screen
customer_reviews.text: this product was a really bad laptop. After half a year it completely stopped working, I recommend not to buy this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Rafi

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Screws were falling out of the laptop for some odd reason wouldn’t really recommend to anyone else to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Quise

customer_reviews.title: The specs and price
customer_reviews.text: It is all that I needed and looking for. Great price Amazon came thru again. Keep up the good work. Thanks !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great budget laptop
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop for the price. Does everything I need it to. Display is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

product_meta.title: CHUWI LapBook Pro 14.1 inch Windows 10 Laptop, 1080P Laptop Computer with Intel Gemini-Lake N4100 8GB RAM / 256GB SSD, Support Linux, 4K, BT 4.0, Dual WiFi
feature_bullets: Powered by Intel Gemini-Lake N4100 quad core 64-bit processor (up to 2.4GHz), 8GB RAM makes the multitasks feel smooth and responsive, and 256GB SSD storage can save more data, which is faster than HDD. Extremely lightweight laptop at only I.3kg and only 0.22 inch thin, with an unbelievable texture.

14.1 inch IPS full lamination display with 1920 x 1080 Resolution, better experience for watching video and daily use. And 90% screen-to body ratio gives you a wider field of view, even under strong outdoor lighting. In addition, night mode and color adjustment will help reduce eye strain.

To prevent typing fatigue, LapBook Pro is equipped with a backlit keyboard in the perfect key distance. The LED inserted in the keyboard provides precise lightness to avoid light leaking, reflecting, or even sight interference. Furthermore, the ergonomic button design offers you a comfortable typing experience.

Multiple Ports, more convenient. It comes with 4 ports, 1* USB 3.0, 1* Headphone, 1* Type-c and 1* Micro Video port. Type-c port can be used for charging and data transmission. And it also supports windows 10 touchpad gesture.
It equips large battery capacity with 37.24Wh battery, Designed for on-the-go users with an all-day battery life of up to 8 hours. Dual band WIFI 2.4G / 5G.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars133 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
